summary:
Software for the Public Good - ASF’s open source software is used ubiquitously around the world with more than 8,400 committers contributing to more than 320 active projects.

 The most popular open source software is Apache… - DZone, “What Open Source Software Do You Use?”

 Apache-style licensing may yield more adoption and money. - Matt Asay, c|net

 Apache’s 'survival of the fittest' ethos breeds better software - ZDNet

 Give Back to the Apache Community with a Year-End Donation - Foundation Blog

 Strengthening Security for Apache Airflow - Foundation Blog

 First-Time ASF Contributors Improve Technical Documentation for ASF Projects and Its Users - Foundation Blog
